name: Cumulus Oulu Hotel

reviews.text: Nice hotel, which is mainly used for overnights by travellers on their way to Rovaniemi and Lapland. Hotel itself and service are ok, same as hotel staff.
reviews.title: Simple, but nice

reviews.text: Hotel is clean enough and staff was friendly. Location is about 3 blocks from "action" which makes it very quiet in the evening.
reviews.title: clean and decent ... quiet area

description: Modern downtown hotel with diverse restaurants, near Rotuarri Pedestrian Street, the market square & Tietomaa Science Centre.
